text: The supercatcher came to the great winery, and when he was given the chance to try the new sherry's blonde broth, he said without any hesitation: "You know butterfly Everyone was perplexed because the supercatcher's opinion was undeniable. As if he were speaking in a figurative way, they asked him, "What does that mean? "Nothing, do not be alarmed", replied the genius in distinguishing flavors. That means a butterfly fell in the tub. Doubting such subtlety, they climbed a ladder to see if the drowned butterfly could be seen, and indeed a white butterfly had drowned in the blond nectar. FIN
title: Sabe a mariposa
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
